resources.string: Leads to the host actions panel. must be android 10 and up to use.
Leads to the client actions panel.
disconnects all connections between the phones and stops all background activities. phone will be on unknown status

phone will be on advertise status. advertises the phone as the host for other phones(clients) to connect to. before a connection is initiated a dialog will pop up for the user to accept/decline it. once connected, phone will be on connected status

phone will be on discover status. discovers host phones which pressed the advertise button option to form a connection between them, before a connection is initiated a dialog will pop up for the user to accept/decline it. once connected, phone will be on connected status
a list for the host showing suggested links sent by clients. once a link is pressed it will be removed from the list and the link will be opened
clients can use this option in order to send the host links of music videos from youtube to be streamed from the host to the clients in sync

initialize audio capture, a dialog will pop up asking for permission to audio record the phones internal audio. once the dialog is accepted the init button will be replaced with the start stream button

starts streaming the internal audio of the hosts phone to the connected clients, a service will start in the background for the streaming which will allow the user to open music applications without staying in the app . this also stops the phone from being advertised to other clients for new connections.
stops the audio stream to the connected clients, closes the phones audio capture and closes the stream service running in the background
